terms.intro: Welcome to <bold>{{appName}}</bold>, a mobile application operated by <bold>{{companyName}}</bold> ('Company', 'we', 'us', 'our'). These Terms of Service (the 'Legal Terms') govern your access to and use of the App. By using the Services, you agree to be bound by these Legal Terms.
terms.section_1_text: The App is intended for users who are at least 18 years old. Persons under the age of 18 are not permitted to use or register for the Services.
user_rep_list: You have the legal capacity and agree to comply with these Legal Terms.
You are not a minor in the jurisdiction in which you reside.
You will not access the Services through automated or non-human means (bots, scripts).
You will not use the Services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
terms.section_2_title: 2. Description of Our Services and AI Disclaimer
terms.section_2_text: Aura AI is an AI-powered photo editor designed to generate AI avatars, virtual try-ons, and style transformations. The App allows users to upload photos to receive AI-generated content.
terms.ai_disclaimer_text: The content generated is powered by Artificial Intelligence. The AI may make mistakes or 'hallucinate'. We do not guarantee accuracy. You are responsible for reviewing generated images.
terms.section_3_payments: Payments: You agree to provide current, complete, and accurate purchase information. Transactions are processed by the respective app store.
terms.section_3_subs: Subscriptions: Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
terms.section_3_refunds: Cancellation and Refunds: All purchases are non-refundable. Refund requests must be made through Apple or Google.
terms.section_4_text: We own all intellectual property rights in our Services. We grant you a revocable, non-exclusive, limited right to install and use the Application.
terms.section_5_text: By posting Contributions (photos), you grant us a right to host, use, and process them for the purpose of providing the AI generation services. You warrant that your Contributions do not infringe any third-party rights.
section_6_list: Systematically retrieve data to create databases.
Trick, defraud, or mislead other users.
Use the Services to generate NSFW or illegal content.
terms.section_7_text: The Services may contain links to third-party websites. We do not investigate or monitor these Third-Party Contents.
terms.section_8_text: We reserve the right to deny access to the Services for any reason, including breach of these Legal Terms.
terms.section_9_text: We reserve the right to change or remove the contents of the Services at any time.
terms.section_10_text: THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON AN 'AS IS' AND 'AS AVAILABLE' BASIS. YOUR USE OF THE SERVICES WILL BE AT YOUR SOLE RISK.
terms.section_11_text: IN NO EVENT WILL WE BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, CONSEQUENTIAL, EXEMPLARY, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES.
terms.section_12_text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold us harmless from any loss, damage, liability, claim, or demand.
terms.section_13_text: We care about data privacy and security. Please review our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into these Legal Terms.
terms.section_14_text: You consent to receive electronic communications, and you agree that all agreements, notices, disclosures, and other communications we provide to you electronically satisfy any legal requirement.
terms.section_15_text: These Legal Terms are governed by the laws of the State of Delaware (United States).
terms.section_16_text: Disputes will be resolved by binding arbitration in Delaware.
terms.section_17_text: These Legal Terms constitute the entire agreement. If any provision is determined to be unlawful, that provision is deemed severable.

privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how <bold>{{companyName}}</bold> collects, uses, and discloses information about you when you use <bold>{{appName}}</bold>.
section_1_a_list: Account Information: Name and email (managed by third-party auth).
User Content: Photos you upload for AI processing.
privacy.section_3_text: We do not sell your personal data. We share data only with AI Providers (for processing), Backend Infrastructure (for storage), and for Legal Requirements.
section_4_list: Images are converted and sent to AI providers securely.
We do NOT permanently store your source images after processing.
We retain account info while active.
privacy.section_5_text: We use industry-standard security measures. However, no internet transmission is 100% secure.
privacy.section_6_text: You may request deletion of your account and data within the app or by contacting us.
privacy.section_7_text: The App is not intended for children under 18. We do not knowingly collect info from children.
privacy.section_8_text: We may update this policy. We will notify you of changes.

profile.subject: Aura AI Support

profile.account_deleted_msg: Your account data has been successfully removed.
profile.delete_error: Could not delete account. Please try again.

report.title: Report Content
report.msg: If this image is inappropriate or offensive, please report it. Our team will review it.
report.success_msg: Thanks for your report. We have hidden the content and will review it shortly.
